1.0.2.en: Moved API key from environment to settings as this is a paid service.

1.0.5.en: Updated images and fixed all delays so the flow in the image will playback just perfectly.

1.0.6.en: Added the new images once more

1.0.8.en: Improved help text in flows + added community forum ID

1.0.9.en: Added punctation to the questions if missing (or the chatbot will try to continue the question. + Updated some translations + gave some context about my other app.

1.1.0.en: Added an advanced flow card that returns the full answer + Updated the text and translations + added information about pricing + added selection of engines + added rate limitation + added safety guards to prevent lockups. + Added response text when aborted due to time constraints or too long text. + Reduced maxlength to 4500 as anything above makes ChatGPT crash.

1.1.3.en: Moved the AD for my other app into an image in the settings page

1.1.4.en: Added logging interface to the setup screen.
